thread.title: Tillerson firing caps off rocky tenure

title: Tillerson firing caps off rocky tenure
text:
Tillerson firing caps off rocky tenure 4:45pm EDT - 02:16 
U.S. President Donald Trump fired Secretary of State Rex Tillerson on Tuesday after a series of public rifts over policy on North Korea, Russia and Iran, replacing his chief diplomat with loyalist CIA Director Mike Pompeo. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. President Donald Trump fired Secretary of State Rex Tillerson on Tuesday after a series of public rifts over policy on North Korea, Russia and Iran, replacing his chief diplomat with loyalist CIA Director Mike Pompeo.
